name: Feature request
about: Propose a detailed, well-researched enhancement with clear specifications
labels: enhancement
---

**ðŸ’¡ Have an idea but want to discuss it first?** Consider starting in our [Ideas & Feature Requests Discussions](https://github.com/power-modules/framework/discussions/categories/ideas-feature-requests) to gather community input before creating a formal feature request.

**This template is for detailed, well-researched proposals with clear specifications.**

## Problem
What problem does this solve? Who benefits?

## Proposal
Describe the API or behavior you propose.

## Alternatives
What else did you consider? Why is this better?

## Example
Short pseudo-code or usage example.

## Scope
- Breaking change? yes/no
- Tests and docs impact?
